title: Hash One Gaming - LFM Dia1+ Top Laner - Challenger 5v5 - Competitive Team Environment

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there everyone,

Right now Hash One Gaming is currently recruiting for our competitive league of legends team "Hash1 AlterEgo". We're looking for a few dedicated people who are wanting to improve their skill in a team environment, whilst competing in tournaments - both online and LAN.

As of now, we're sitting at 11 on the Oceanic Open Ladder with intentions of making it to the top 8. We're currently looking for a dedicated **Top Laner**

As a recruit wanting to join Hash One Gaming, we'd expect you to be:
*1. Dedicated to training at least 3 times per week
2. Non-Toxic
3. A mature player with a competitive drive
4. Diamond1/Master/Challenger
5. Teamspeak3 and a working microphone*

Please be aware that filling out the form doesn't mean you'll be tried out. The more effort you put into the form, the higher chance we'll be in contact with you.

Signup Form: http://hash1.pw/joinus
